summary: This Mod adds a ton of health to your Flame Thralls so they might endure longer battles without having to get reconjured every minute.
descriptionHtml:
I was tired of the weak Atronachs ingame getting one shotted by every minor enemy on Master difficulty. Since I am a 100 Conjuration Charachter, I thought I'd buff their health a bit.

This buffs the Flame Thrall's HP to around 8000 (thats rly unbalanced atm) but it helps not having to reconjure them every minute. The amount of health might change (depending on what feedback I get) in later versions.

Enjoy!
author: Baskiney
